Title: "Sam's Game: The Inside Edge"

In "Sam's Game: The Inside Edge," Samantha "Sam" Reid, a former Wall Street whiz kid, has retired to a quiet life teaching economics. However, when her retired broker father is arrested for insider trading, Sam's tranquil existence is shattered.

Believing in her father's innocence, Sam re-enters the high-stakes world of finance to clear his name. Using her keen intellect and extensive industry knowledge, she begins to unravel a complex web of deceit and corruption within the financial institutions she thought she knew so well.

As she delves deeper, Sam discovers a vast insider trading ring, with tentacles reaching into the highest echelons of power. With time running out and the SEC closing in, Sam must navigate the treacherous waters of Wall Street, outwit ruthless enemies, and stay one step ahead of the law to expose the truth.

"Sam's Game: The Inside Edge" is a thrilling financial crime novel that combines intricate plot twists, sharp wit, and unforgettable characters. It's a gripping exploration of the dark side of financial prowess, the lengths people will go to for wealth and power, and one woman's struggle to regain her honor amidst the chaos.
